channel.title: Art on Home on Rails
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Home on Rails

item.title: Monthly Art #36
item.description:
This is a monthly “newsletter”, containing a list of what I enjoyed the most last month. Whether it was a full length movie, short film, music album, book or even a painting.

For my birthday this year, I did a 10-day silent vipassana meditation, this time in Pyin Oo Lwin, Myanmar ????. We went into silence on the night of my birthday, the 19th. Here’s what I know ????

— jack (@jack) December 9, 2018

item.title: Monthly Art #35
item.description:
This is a monthly “newsletter”, containing a list of what I enjoyed the most last month. Whether it was a full length movie, short film, music album, book or even a painting.

Here's a dystopian vision of the future: A real announcement I recorded on the Beijing-Shanghai bullet train. (I've subtitled it so you can watch in silence.) pic.twitter.com/ZoRWtdcSMy

— James O'Malley (@Psythor) October 29, 2018

item.title: Monthly Art #33
item.description:
This is a monthly “newsletter”, containing a list of what I enjoyed the most last month. Whether it was a full length movie, short film, music album, book or even a painting.

Everything is opposite from what mainstream Western culture preaches

True confidence comes from humility

True freedom comes from limitation

True contentment comes from faith

True happiness comes from dissolution of the self

— T. S. Eliott Wave (@CryptoMichaelT) July 8, 2018

item.title: Route in Ecuador
item.description:
(image credit: https://www.flickr.com/photos/wurglitsch/9466325427)

This route was suggested to me by girl from Ecuador (thanks Carla), whom I met in Mexico on Dec. 10, 2017.
